backend/main.mo: Defines data types for services, users, orders, payments, samples, and state maps for storing them within the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing two features: replacing fallback product banner images and rebuilding the app, including impacted components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries for multiple frontend files describing their purpose, styles, hooks, components, and page structures.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining extensive OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading main React entrypoint and Tidio script with root mount element.
frontend/public/deploy-marker.txt: Deployment marker noting replacement of four product banner fallback images with new uploads and readiness for build.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the full TanStack Router configuration, global providers, and all product, payment, and dashboard routes.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductBan: Admin panel to upload and manage product banner sample images with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/AdminGate.tsx: Wrapper that renders children only for admin callers using an admin-check hook, with optional fallback.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Auth guard that redirects unauthenticated users to login and shows a loading spinner during identity initialization.
frontend/src/components/BrandFooter.tsx: Footer component with branding, quick links, contact info, and Caffeine.ai attribution using dynamic year and hostname.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Header component with navigation, authentication actions, mobile menu, and service scrolling logic.
frontend/src/components/BrandLayout.tsx: Wraps pages with a header, footer, and main content layout.
frontend/src/components/OtpDemoField.tsx: Generates a demo OTP and verifies user input using a 6‑digit OTP UI component.
frontend/src/components/ProductAddToCart: Handles sample selection, form validation, and submitting product orders to the cart.
frontend/src/components/ProductOrderForm: Provides form fields for brand name and description with live word counting.
frontend/src/components/ProductSampleSel: Displays sample design thumbnails and lets users choose one.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Renders a simple service card with icon, name, price, delivery time, and optional action.
frontend/src/constants/premiumServices.t: Defines fixed premium service metadata and helpers to retrieve display info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddToCart.ts: Provides mutations to add items to cart and a query to fetch caller orders using react-query and an actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrderVerifica: Hooks for checking admin status, verifying payments, and fetching orders or notification requests via actor queries and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthState.ts: Derives authentication state and principal string from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useConfirmationEmailR: Mutation hook to submit confirmation email requests and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useConfirmationMessag: Fetches the confirmation message template from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateCheckoutSess: Creates a Stripe checkout session via actor call and parses the returned JSON session data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, auth client setup, login/logout logic, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderPayment.ts: Mutation hook to update order payment status and refresh caller orders.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductBannerSampl: Hooks to fetch and update product banner samples and map them into predefined sample slots.
frontend/src/hooks/useServices.ts: Fetches available services from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeConfiguratio: Hooks to check and set Stripe configuration, invalidating related queries on update.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeVerification: Hooks for verifying Stripe payments and checking session status via actor mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupport.ts: Handles submitting support requests and fetching them with authorization fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches and saves user profiles, exposing loading state and invalidating profile queries on updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based premium black-and-gold theme styles and service card UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/BusinessCardPage.tsx: Renders a product page for Business Card Design with details, banner image, contact link, and add‑to‑cart section.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows a styled contact page with email and WhatsApp links and simple hover effects.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user dashboard with service selection, form handling, admin tools, and add‑to‑cart logic.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero section, premium services section, scrolling behavior, and navigation to ordering or dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides Internet Identity login flow with error handling and redirect on success.
frontend/src/pages/LogoDesignPage.tsx: Renders a product page for Logo Design with details, banner image, contact link, and add‑to‑cart section.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Confirms completed orders, checks payment authorization, and displays success or access‑denied states.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment cancellation message, retrieves the pending orderId from sessionStorage, and offers retry or dashboard navigation.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentPage.tsx: Loads an order, checks Stripe readiness, and initiates a checkout session while handling errors and redirecting to Stripe.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Verifies a completed Stripe session, confirms the order, handles errors, and redirects to the order confirmation page.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoFramePage.tsx: Shows details for the Photo Frame Design service with imagery and a section to add the product to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Displays premium service pricing cards and lists accepted payment options including Stripe and PayPal.
frontend/src/pages/ProductBannerPage.tsx: Provides preview toggles for Product Banner designs and includes an add‑to‑cart section.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists all premium services and routes users to login or dashboard when ordering based on authentication status.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpPage.tsx: Sign-up page that handles Internet Identity login, checks for an existing profile, and submits a basic profile form. Manages auth flow, validation, and redirects to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/TrackOrderPage.tsx: Order-tracking page that loads the caller’s orders, finds the requested order, and displays status details or an error if not found. Includes status icons, descriptions, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/utils/stripeOrderMapping.ts: Maps an ExpandedOrder into a Stripe ShoppingItem array by parsing price and constructing a single-item purchase. Ensures valid price format and uses BigInt for price and quantity.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL hash. Supports both query-string and hash-based routing.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Provides word-count and description validation plus a basic email format validator. Enforces a 1000-word limit for descriptions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries. Defines global styling tokens and layout settings.
project_state.json: Project state describing goals to replace Product Banner sample images and rebuild/deploy the app, with notes on deployment issues and feature request tracking.
